name: UE4 Spring Game Jam - Two Sided Coin
name_original: UE4 Spring Game Jam - Two Sided Coin
description:
Team Name Zarin Vandyk

Gameplay Instructions A - Move Left, D - Move Right, Space - Jump - Left mouse button to spawn coin, Right mouse button to switch gravity. Unfortunately, you can't pick up the coin. But you can just respawn it to get it into the right spot.

Link to Gameplay Footage 


What platform is your game built for?

Windows 64-bit

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission. I used the platformer asset pack, and the retro 8 bit sounds from the marketplace. I also used the default space scene from the space skybox generator program, and I also used a few of the starter content particles and sounds.
